title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2838/93 of 18 October 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1579/93 in respect of aid for milk producers in Portugal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2838/93 of 18 October 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1579/93 in respect of aid for milk producers in Portugal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 1579/93 is hereby amended as follows:
1. The second paragraph of Article 2 is deleted.
2. The following paragraph is added to Article 3:
'4. Aid shall be paid as follows:
(a) For producers submitting an aid application relating to the delivery quota, the competent authority shall pay the aid directly to the producers or via the purchaser each month on the basis of a declaration from the purchaser showing the quantity  delivered during the previous month and after checking the quantity actually eligible and compliance with the guaranteed total quantity for deliveries.
(b) For producers submitting an application relating to the direct sales quota, the aid shall be paid at the end of the marketing year after checks have been carried out on the quantity actually eligible and compliance with the guaranteed total quantity  for direct sales.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 April 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
